Hymn.Arabic: حَسَبَ رَحْمَتِكَ اذْكُرنِي أَنْتَ ، مِنْ أَجْلِ صَلَاحِكَ يَا رَبُّ ،
Hymn.English: 7 According to Your mercy remember me, For Your goodness' sake, O Lord
8 Good and upright is the Lord.

Hymn.Arabic: مِنْ أَجْلِ اسْمِكَ يَا رَبُّ تَغْفِرُ لِي خَطِيَّتِى لِأَنَّهَا كَثِيرَةٌ. هَتِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 11 For Your name's sake, O Lord, Pardon my iniquity, for it is great.
